articles.title: Adnan Syed's murder conviction on hold for now, as Maryland Supreme Court considers appeal
articles.description: Maryland’s highest court has issued an order to prevent Adnan Syed's murder conviction from being reinstated by a lower court, as the court decides whether to hear his appeal of the lower court’s decision
articles.content:
ANNAPOLIS, Md. -- Adnan Syed will not return to jail and his murder conviction is on hold, for now, as Maryland's Supreme Court decides whether to hear his appeal.

articles.title: Murder-Suicides Reach Record High
articles.description: The vast majority of murder-suicides are perpetrated by men, often using guns, experts told Newsweek. Societal factors may have made the problem worse.
